result.taxonomicnotes: There are no relevant taxonomic limitations.
result.rationale: This species is native to the Aripuanã river basin in Mato Grosso, Brazil. It has a restricted extent of occurrence (EOO) of 2,963 km<sup>2</sup> to 19,119 km<sup>2</sup>. There is a projected continuing decline in habitat based on dam construction. Therefore, it is assessed as Near Threatened.
result.geographicrange: This species is native to the Aripuanã river basin in Mato Grosso, Brazil (ICMBio 2018).
result.population: No information is available on the population.
result.habitat: This species occurs in lakes near to the main Aripuanã river (ICMBio 2018).
result.threats: Dam construction could be a future threat to the species (ICMBio 2018).
result.conservationmeasures: There is no information on conservation actions in place or recommended for this species.
result.usetrade: There is no information about species use or trade.
